bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, hybrid geometry, 26" comfort frame, formed tubes, forged dropouts w/ replaceable hanger

components.description: SR Suntour NEX-4110V2, 63mm travel, 1pc. alloy lower, Hi-Ten stanchions and steerer, coil/mcu w/ preload adjust, spring assisted seals
Ground control adjustable rise, alloy head/quill, 25.4mm clamp
Hi-Ten Comfort riser bar, 25.4mm, 60mm rise, 620mm wide, 15 degree back sweep, 5 degree up
Alloy 4-finger, kraton lever pad, for twist shifter
Shimano FD-TX50, 31.8mm clamp, top swing, dual pull
Cartridge bearing, square spindle with crank stop right side and capless bolts
Comfort pedal, composite body w/rubber top, sealed loose ball bearings
Double sealed, ground race, dual lock nuts w/ 17mm contact side, 5mm QR
Double sealed, ground race, freewheel type, QR
Specialized Hemisphere, 26x1.95", 60TPI, wire bead w/ Flak Jacket protection
Specialized Hemisphere, 26x1.95", 60TPI, wire bead w/ Flak Jacket protection
Comfort Plus with dual density foam and springs for extra comfort
Chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual, rack mount extensions
